Title: Establishes a pilot program for the dispensing of hearing aids in the county of Westchester
Summary: Establishes a pilot program for the dispensing of hearing aids in the county of Westchester.
LawCode: Add Art 18 ยง1800, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing a pilot program for the dispensing of hearing aids in the county of Westchester; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
